dict.acceptation: 有（ have的第三人称单数 ）；（亲属关系中）接受；拿；买到；

sent.orig: What has happened?; What's the matter?; What has occurred?; What took place?; What has come about?; Has something come up?; What's up with (sb. and sth.)?
The Gulf War has cost Iraq dearly.; Iraq has been drained of its strength by the Gulf War.; The Gulf War has sapped Iraqi vitality badly.
sent.trans: 海湾战争使伊拉克大伤元气。

sent.orig: A cause of action has accrued when the right to sue has become vested.
sent.trans: 起诉的理由在控告权被赋予后随之存在。

sent.orig: A grudge has melted away as the ice.; The feud has melted like ice.
A scheme has been roughed out but it has yet to be discussed and amended.
sent.trans: 方案已经草拟出来了，但还要讨论和修改。
